textBox.richText: We are currently in beta for iWeb Buddy. You can download the current beta from here. As the beta is updated the Sparkle Update will notify you to download the latest copy. If you are running iWeb ’09 then it is highly recommended that you use the beta of iWeb Buddy as it is specifically targeted at iWeb ’09 and ’08 compatibility. If you are running iWeb ’08 you can continue to use the production 1.1 version.
